Package org.jplot2d.interaction

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InteractiveComp
    A generic interface for awt component and swt composite, to provide visual feedback.
    MousePreference
    provide the mouse preference.
    VisualFeedbackDrawer
    This interface define a method to draw visual feedback while processing interactive actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CursorFeedbackBehavior  
    CursorFeedbackHandler  
    GenericMouseEvent
    Generic mouse event for AWT and SWT.
    InteractionHandler
    This class handle the mouse actions that can respond to user's mouse events like left-click, double-click, right-click.
    InteractionManager
    This class handle the mouse actions that can respond to user's mouse events like left-click, double-click, right-click.
    InteractionMode
    An operation mode contains a list of available commands and configuration of how to trigger them.
    InteractionModeHandler
    An operation mode contains a list of available commands and configuration of how to trigger them.
    MouseActivateComponentBehavior
    This behavior defines the destination modes when mouse moving.
    MouseActivateComponentHandler
    This handler activate / deactivate component while mouse moving.
    MouseAdaptiveZoomBehavior  
    MouseAdaptiveZoomHandler  
    MouseAxisAdaptiveZoomBehavior  
    MouseAxisAdaptiveZoomHandler

    MouseAxisWheelZoomHandler  
    MouseBehavior
    A high-level abstraction of mouse action.
    MouseBehaviorHandler<B extends MouseBehavior>
    A high-level abstraction of mouse action.
    MouseButtonCombination
    Button combinations that can be configured to trigger a behavior.
    MouseButtonCombinationEnablity
    A composite of MouseButtonCombination and an enabled property.
    MouseClickBehavior
    A behavior triggered by mouse clicked.
    MouseClickBehaviorHandler<B extends MouseClickBehavior>  
    MouseCoordinatesTooltipBehavior
    This behavior update the coordinates tooltip when mouse moving.
    MouseCoordinatesTooltipHandler
    This handler shows a tooltip to display the coordinates on where the cursor is.
    MouseDragBehavior
    A command triggered by mouse dragging.
    MouseDragBehaviorHandler<T extends MouseDragBehavior>  
    MouseMarqueeHandler<B extends MouseDragBehavior>  
    MouseMarqueeZoomBehavior  
    MouseMarqueeZoomHandler  
    MouseMoveBehavior
    A behavior triggered by mouse moved event.
    MouseMoveBehaviorHandler<B extends MouseMoveBehavior>  
    MouseMoveComponentBehavior  
    MouseMoveComponentHandler  
    MousePanBehavior  
    MousePanHandler  
    MouseWheelBehavior
    A behavior triggered by mouse wheel rotation.
    MouseWheelBehaviorHandler<B extends MouseWheelBehavior>  
    MouseWheelFinerZoomBehavior  
    MouseWheelFinerZoomHandler  
    MouseWheelZoomBehavior  
    MouseWheelZoomHandler  
    PlotDefaultMousePreference
    provide the default mouse preference.
    PlotInteractionManager
    The interaction manager for a plot.
    StringMousePreference
    A mouse preference can load from / save to a properties string
    ValueChangeBehavior
    Provide a feedback to user by listening the value change of InteractionModeHandler
    ValueChangeHandler<B extends ValueChangeBehavior>
